Koga Shuko/Serpentor/Shockwave/Unitron:


"Slag..." Koga Shuko whispered to himself.  Seeing Cyber Claw falling back, 
for the moment at least, he fired an optic blast off at her as a warning 
shot.  Also he saw Shockwave flying around like he owned the place.  Running 
up to Serpentor, he slapped the robot.  

"What the...where am I?" Serpentor said.  "Dang bird shot me!"

"...What?"

"That bird, it hit me with eggs and bit off my arm." he said, raising half a 
stump of his arm.

Shuko sighed, putting Serpentor over his shoulde rand running, Unitron 
exiting the Ark and heading for Shuko.

----

Shockwave got a target lock, firing two missiles and 20 rapid laser bolts off 
at the Ark.
